post.text: I stand for ALL AMERICANS! Deplorables, basement dwellers, I stand for ALL of YOU!

comment.author: Olivia
comment.text: Mr Trump..I want you to take the gloves off next round and go for it. I don't want this garbage to happen again, take control, tell her how the cow eats the cabbage and let her rip!

replies.author: Kaelin
replies.text: I agree!!! Nail her to the wall!!!

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Yes I do too! I think he was showing respect to her and she showed none. He has to take the gloves off and don't back down. I think his team is worried that people might think of him as a sexist.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: Do you really think that he's going to read this? Lmao
